Interface BaseFightAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlternateFireWeapon, Card, CyberBlade, Electroscythe, Flamethrower, Furnace, GrenadaLauncher, Heatseeker, Hellion, LockRifle, MachineGun, Newton, OneOptionalEffectWeapon, PlasmaGun, PowerGlove, PowerUp, Railgun, RocketLauncher, ShockWave, Shotgun, Sledgehammer, TagbackGrenade, TargetingScope, Teleporter, Thor, TractorBeam, TwoEffectWeapon, TwoOptionalEffectWeapon, VortexCannon, Weapon, Whisper, Zx2

    public interface BaseFightAction
    BaseFightAction interface, implemented by the different cards
